name: Publii
title: getpublii.com
shortDescription: Publii is an open-source static CMS designed for creating fast, secure, and privacy-compliant websites easily. It is ideal for bloggers, developers, and small businesses looking to establish a robust online presence without the complexities of dynamic websites. Users can deploy their sites with one-click synchronization across various platforms, benefiting from intuitive content management and beautiful, customizable themes.
pros: GDPR and CCPA compliant for user privacy
cons: May require technical knowledge for customization
Less community support compared to larger CMS platforms

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Hugo
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Fastest build times for static sites
